spec.name: FASTQFETCHER:SRA2FASTQ:SRA_PREFETCH (SRR13255544)
spec.script:
# Prefetch SRA data
    prefetch \
        SRR13255544 \
         --max-size 20G
    
    # Find and move SRA file to work directory
    # Prefetch typically creates: SRR13255544/SRR13255544.sra or downloads to current directory
    if [ -f "SRR13255544/SRR13255544.sra" ]; then
        mv "SRR13255544/SRR13255544.sra" "./SRR13255544.sra"
    elif [ -f "SRR13255544.sra" ]; then
        # Already in current directory
        :
    else
        # Try to find the file
        find . -name "SRR13255544.sra" -type f -exec mv {} "./SRR13255544.sra" \;
    fi
    
    # Verify file exists
    if [ ! -f "SRR13255544.sra" ]; then
        echo "ERROR: SRA file SRR13255544.sra not found after prefetch" >&2
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Get version information
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "FASTQFETCHER:SRA2FASTQ:SRA_PREFETCH":
        prefetch: $(echo $(prefetch --version) | sed -e "s/prefetch : //g" )
    END_VERSIONS
